title: Chest Problem?
body: Hi, So i was checking my champions because i needed chests and i stumbled upon evelynn which had an s- but no chest? Does it need to be an S for a chest? I also know i can get a party mate who gets an S gives me a chest if i havent gotten one yet with that champion. Im just wondering if it has to be an S or is this a bug. I also found i got a chest with master yi with an s- and i dont remember being in a party when i got a chest with him. Thank you

replies.body:
Can you link me the match or screenshot the match from your match history in-client so I can take a look? Any S-, S or S+ should grant a chest *once* during the season as long as you had a chest available when it happened, so if you didn't have one available to earn (look at your profile, top right corner) then you wouldn't have earned one for the S- grade. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Im pretty sure this is the game http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2309553021/231262372?tab=overview I also had 2 chests available and i beleived i got one from yasuo or alistar.

After checking your account, it looks like you didn't receive a chest because you didn't have one available at the time. You can only earn 4 chests per month and it looks like you had earned quite a lot both before and after that Eve game. 

Check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more information on the system. Let me know if you have any questions.
Alright. Thank you for you help appreciate the time! Good Luck in the Future!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
